messages.title: A record of service...
messages.content: From the very start of our campaign, Tom has really helped our family, and especially Henry, who he introduced from his very Parliament chair...he's honestly looked after any concern we've put to him and the support he's given us.

messages.title: A promise of more.
messages.content: It's been an honour to represent Tonbridge, Edenbridge and Malling as your MP since 2015. I'm asking for your support on Thursday 12 December to deliver Brexit, and continue to work on the key local issues...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More investment for our medical facilities and better schools.
Buses are things I've delivered for our towns and villages.

issues.health: More investment for our medical facilities

leaflet.personalStatement: It's been an honour to represent Tonbridge, Edenbridge and Malling as your MP since 2015...

politicalExperience.role: MP for Tonbridge, Edenbridge and Malling
politicalExperience.achievements: Delivered better schools, medical facilities and investments for towns and villages.

quotes.text: The advice that Tom has provided throughout our campaign has been exceptional. He has kindly taken our concerns to the very top of government and has consistently listened and supported our objectives, enabling us to amplify our voice throughout the community.
